text: Ronald Milton Mottl (born February 6, 1934) is an American politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He had been a member of the state House of Representatives of Ohio from 1987 to 1997. A conservative Democrat, Mottl was an ally of Ronald Reagan's legislative agenda. He lost the Democratic primary to Ed Feighan in 1982, thereby losing his seat. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Ohio Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Cleveland
title: Ronald M. Mottl
